pathAssistantSteps.info:
The opportunity/event has been disqualified.


Hint: Please populate the closed disqualified reason and closed comments with as much details as possible.

Client will no longer move forward with OE to delivery their event.


Hint: Please populate the closed lost reason and closed comments with as much details as possible. Update the competitors field too.

Client has agreed to move forward with OE to delivery their event. Once all fields are filled in accurately, the opportunity can then be converted into an order.  


Hint: Please populate the closed won reason and closed comments with as much details as possible. Update the competitors field too.

A successful first call with the prospect has been conducted and all parties agree that there is a real opportunity. The objective is to gather more information to begin matching OE solutions to the prospect’s needs.​


Hint: Complete all fields in Solution Details to mark Discovery as complete and mark Solution as current stage.

A proposal, including formal pricing for specific products, has been sent to the Prospect.​


Hint: Mark this stage as current as soon as a formal proposal is sent.

All opportunities begin here as a Sales Qualified Opportunity (SQO). Opportunities can be manually created, auto-created from an existing Institutional Business order that may repeat or auto-created by converting a lead that has a confirmed discovery meeting on the calendar. ​


Hint: All fields in the top section and Discovery Details must be completed to mark stage as complete and mark Discovery as current stage.

A custom demo and/or solution has been created for the Prospect based on information collected during discovery. You are ready to add specific Products into the opportunity to build a customized proposal.​


Hint: Ensure Products, Contact Roles and Opportunity Team sections are updated and accurate.
